website_summaries.verdict: Another great option for those who have sensitive skin.
pros: A little bit goes a long way
Doesn't run when it gets wet
cons: Some people don't like the natural scent of the product

customer_reviews.title: Also Good for Men
customer_reviews.text: I use this because it is phthalate-free and very affordable. Among their many side effects, phthalates lower testosterone (in both genders). Any cosmetic products containing "fragrance" likely contain phthalates, while sensitive-skin and unscented products often do not. I don't mind that the label says the product is for women—the label is purely marketing. It is more manly to maintain my testosterone while using a "women's" shaving gel than the other way around.
customer_reviews.author: Captain Picard

customer_reviews.title: Very light scent but super rich
customer_reviews.text: Use this after you've showered because after you rinse it off you've got this amazing layer of softness that lasts all day long!! I love it, however it's a little weird at first...did I not rinse well enough? Is this residue and what's it doing to my pores? That's why the 4 stars.... jury is still out for the long term effect
customer_reviews.author: Rachel RocksTop Contributor: Health & Wellness

customer_reviews.title: Former Skintimate user- never going back!
customer_reviews.text: I have been a loyal skintimate my entire life, but needed something cheaper and to be delivered fast before I went away on a vacation. I bought this since it was cheap, but was pleasantly surprised with this brand! I can use less and it “froths” up just the same as the competitor. It also makes my legs feel much smoother afterwards. I’m generally a very brand loyal person- but this price and quality got me to switch!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Cahill

customer_reviews.title: Eliminates Razor Burn and Cuts
customer_reviews.text: At a little over $2 per bottle you can't go wrong with this set. In stores, each bottle costs me $3.50, so this is an incredible savings. The gel works really well with my sensitive skin. I let it soak in for about 2 mins before shaving. I use it on my legs and underarms with a Gillette Men's 3 blade sensitive razor, as well. The gel in each bottle lasts about a month shaving every other day, so it foams up quite voluminously. I am very pleased with this set and eliminates razor burn and cuts.
customer_reviews.author: FelineFriendly

customer_reviews.title: Can rusts easily and stains your shower
customer_reviews.text: What keeps me from repurchasing this shaving cream at such a good price is the Aluminum can that easily and stains my shower—every time! I’ve tried over 4 times and this happens very quickly and I have to put something under the can to keep it from staining. I switched to Eos in Plastic non aluminum Can Also plastic is better for the environment than aluminum. Aluminum should never be put in landfills, because it leach into the earth. Aluminum should always be recycled. But these cans (unlike soda cans) usually are not recycled!
customer_reviews.author: MayaNYC

customer_reviews.title: Fixed razor bumps!
customer_reviews.text: I have always had issues with razor bumps with my very sensitive skin. This shaving cream is the best! I like how the scent isn’t to strong and flowery too.
customer_reviews.author: lexi

customer_reviews.title: Good amount in each bottle
customer_reviews.text: Foams quickly and the spray mechanism works rly well. Good amount in each bottle, been using just one of them for the past several months. However, it still slightly irritates down there, gives a slight warm burn feel. I’ve been using this product for several months now though, and no problems have developed from it. And once I wash the foam off, the irritation goes right away and doesn’t persist.
customer_reviews.author: Rukia DeMartino

customer_reviews.title: A little can go a long way.
customer_reviews.text: I’m an Occupational Therapist and I work with young children with tactile defensiveness and those who need help drawing letters and shapes. Using shaving cream is very useful. I look for items that have Very light or no smell to help these children not have smell be yet another sense that may be upsetting. This product has a light scent and a little goes a long way. I like that the product is not very expensive since like many things schools don’t reimburse for these kinds of items. This is both affordable and has a soft texture.
customer_reviews.author: LKPressOTR

customer_reviews.title: Smooth Shaving!
customer_reviews.text: Before this product, I regularly used Skintimate. I find that when using Satin Care, my legs feel smoother longer. I feel safe shaving while using Satin Care. I have sensitive skin and knowing that I can use Satin Care and feel great, days after a clean shave means a lot to me. I do not end up with razor bumps or razor burn the next morning when I wake up or have to worry about an allergic reaction with this shaving cream. This product says it all: Satin Care Ultra-Sensitive! Would I recommend this? YES!
customer_reviews.author: Living the dream!

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as the other more expensive brands
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this because it was two for one and a great price. The top broke off when I first used it, bit managed to get it back on part way. It's still useable. The gel is more of a cream than other brands that are a bit more expensive. It doesn't quite compare to the other gel brands for ladies. The scent is almost non-existent. It doesn't give you a really close shave like some other gels. It's good for sensitive skin, however. I will be buying the more expensive brand that I'm used to next time.
customer_reviews.author: Powerpuffed

customer_reviews.title: For “sensitive skin”
customer_reviews.text: After reading the reviews and comparing the value to other products I purchased this item. I’m disappointed in the marketing. You know those little asterisks on products that usually say something along the lines of “compared to this brand” well this one states it’s sensitive “*vs ivory bar soap”. Would not recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: It’s worth the price and really is for ultra sensitive skin!
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t use this right away when I got it and recently started using it. It is definitely for ultra sensitive skin. My skin is super sensitive so I’m careful of what I apply. I had hard time finding a good shaving cream and this is perfect! It is a gel and a little goes long way! It’s two pack so should last for a good amount of time! After shaving my skin is super soft, mean it does the moisturizing job as it should be. Definitely worth the price and 5 starts.
customer_reviews.author: Saum

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Complete waste of money. Dont feel any different from shaving in shower without any cream at all. Still have irritated skin and got more cuts with a new razor, the cream didnt help at all. I did not notice any moisturizing effect either. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: Lathers up nicely without having to use too much. Great value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Mixs

customer_reviews.title: Blah
customer_reviews.text: Nothing wrong with the seller, but don’t care for the actual product. I have never used this brand before but decided to try since going to the store is not convenient anymore. It says for sensitive skin so I decided to try. The actual cream comes out nice but it feels super drying. There is no slip or glide when you shave. I’ll finish up what I bought but will not purchase again
customer_reviews.author: dirtfox13

customer_reviews.title: Best find this year on Amazon, No more burns
customer_reviews.text: I have sensitive skin and razor burn has always been a big problem, I mean the just don't shave unless I have to. But this stuff WORKS, No red face or burns. It took me lots if products but, finally I found it and it's cheap, I've paid three tines as much for nothing.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Means

customer_reviews.title: NOT FOR SENSITIVE SKIN 👎🏻
customer_reviews.text: Caused my legs to breakout all over the place. I had MASSIVE whiteheads bulging and I discontinued this and used my old shaving cream and no more whiteheads... Very disappointed. Blah. 👎🏻 Took forever to this discoloration and healing marks to go away for all the acne it left.
customer_reviews.author: John Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Moisturizing Gel
customer_reviews.text: I have real sensitive skin and this shave gel works wonders. My skin feels moisturized. I will reorder.
customer_reviews.author: I R MCDONALD

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Nice lathering shaving cream with minimal fragrance. However, one can lasts only about 1 week to a week and a half. If you can buy the multi packs at a discount, great. If not, you'll be spending a ton of money on shaving cream.
customer_reviews.author: sandra simpson-kraft

customer_reviews.title: Really nice
customer_reviews.text: Satin Care makes a nice shaving gel for sensitive skin. It truly is for sensitive skin as my legs loved it. It’s of the thicker texture, soft & creamy. A little goes a long way. It’s very moisturizing. There’s little scent to it. The can is designed so it won’t rust. The price for a 2 pack is unbeatable. This won’t disappoint. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: meshelle

customer_reviews.title: Super good for sensitive skin!
customer_reviews.text: I was worried about buying this cause I have super sensitive skin & I usually use the skintimate sensitive one. This is actually way better. It’s thicker for sure, I don’t have to use as much & the bottle is bigger & is a couple dollars cheaper than the 2pk of skintimate. The only thing is it kinda has a odd smell. Not nasty but not good. I don’t care though! I totally recommend for sensitive skin!
customer_reviews.author: Ariel

customer_reviews.title: Great for sensitive skin!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a guy and I always get bad razorburn after every shave. I was looking for something new to try for sensitive skin and came across this. I know it's for women, but I figured shaving gel is shaving gel and decided to buy this (the price isn't bad either. I've been using it for a week (I shave every other day) and so far so good. It has greatly reduced my razorburn after every shave and leaves my skin feeling soft. I recommend it for anyone who has sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Love it will always use no matter what
customer_reviews.text: I love this! So smooth and so soothing for my legs. My skin is super sensitive and this helps so much when I shave no razor burn at all whatsoever! I use it on everything: let’s, privates, and armpits. So perfect and no problems whatsoever. Definitely will buy again and such a great price plus delivered right to my door so I don’t even have to leave the house to get it. 100%
customer_reviews.author: lexieanne

customer_reviews.title: Works well!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful shaving cream. I wouldmt necessarily call it "moisturizing" but it lets the razor seamlessly glide along your skin. No real fragrance, which is fine with me - I don't need my shaving cream to smell like fake fruit. My skin isn't overly sensitive, so I can't speak to how well it is for those with more sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: E.R.

customer_reviews.title: Misleading product description
customer_reviews.text: Sensitive skin people beware. This product says it it for sensitive skin because it has no dyes. But after receiving it and reading the ingredients it has both lavender and eucalyptus oils in it!
customer_reviews.author: SHERYL GEIMKE

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic price, fantastic gentle shave cream. My husband loves it too
customer_reviews.text: Great price for a great shave cream! Thick lather, good shave. This has no smell at all. I kinda which it had some natural fragrance, but it's good for people with allergies. My husband started using this on his face too, and he likes it better than his men's shave butter. It's not drying or moisturizing. Once you rise it off, it's like nothing happened. No residue, no dryness, nothing.
customer_reviews.author: SmolCat

customer_reviews.title: Just another cheap option
customer_reviews.text: I’m not in love with this product, but since I didn’t want to spend a lot of money on shave gel, I tried it. The bottles are big. It comes in a pack of two. My skin is sensitive but I didn’t notice any difference between using this and my conditioner.
customer_reviews.author: Alejandra

customer_reviews.title: Need more scent to it
customer_reviews.text: The shaving cream is good but much cheaper at a store. I didnt like the scent tho. I gave it a 1 star cause the price and scent
customer_reviews.author: Desirae

customer_reviews.title: Moisturizing & Cushiony but Allows for a Close Shave!
customer_reviews.text: I’m very impressed by these shaving gels especially with the great value pricing! I’ve used Gillette in the past but never the Ultra Sensitive one. It is definitely very cushiony and moisturizing for the most delicate of skin types. I have PCOS so I’m a bit of a hairy beast. So getting a close shave all over is important to me. This, while providing a cushiony lather, still allows for a very close shave! I recommend!
customer_reviews.author: TaylorAC

customer_reviews.title: Favorite shaving cream... never trying “trendier” products again!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this shaving cream for years, and last year I tried the EOS Lavender Jasmine shaving cream out of curiosity and hated it! The scent smelled like vanilla graham crackers, instead of lavender jasmine, which I found pleasant. But everything else... the texture, the fact that it wouldn’t foam up, and just slip off my body even without a rinse yet... yeah, never doing that again. It’s like the old saying, “If it ain’t broke, don’t fix it!”
customer_reviews.author: Arielle P.

customer_reviews.title: Best price, no fragrance, good for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased this shaving gel many times via Subscribe and Save. The price is already excellent but combined with an additional 15% off, it's a no brainer. I love that it's fragrance free and it works really well. I prefer this over Skintimate shaving gel.
customer_reviews.author: Yi

customer_reviews.title: Finally stopped my itchy legs
customer_reviews.text: Used to use skintimates and always got itchy legs after shaving no matter how many times I put lotion on. Switched to this no itchiness or irritation. Also noticed way less razor bumps. Scent just smells like regular shave gel without any extra fragrance
customer_reviews.author: Kait

customer_reviews.title: Not thick enough
customer_reviews.text: Does not get thick enough. Will not produce a stick or Rich ladder as you would like it to you. Which results in a mediocre lackluster shaving experience. I do have sensitive skin but I still prefer a much richer cream.
customer_reviews.author: Zee

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: I feel like you don’t have to use a lot of product cause it forms whole bunch of foam once you rub it on your skin. Works perfectly for sensitive skin. Only thing I noticed is that eos shaving cream works better for me, leaves effect of soft skin longer.
customer_reviews.author: Lena&Duca

customer_reviews.title: Great for sensitive or dry skin!
customer_reviews.text: Great shaving gel for sensitive skin! I have super sensitive skin, especially my legs! I always get cut or have razor burn or bumps, but not when using Satin Care Sensitive shave gel. I highly recommend it for all types of skin types!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany H.

customer_reviews.title: Causes all over rash
customer_reviews.text: Broke out in a rash all over my legs. $200 out of pocket for Dr's visit and medication to stop the rash. I am on an 11-day medication due to this crap. I do NOT recommend this for sensitive skin at all. I have no faith in buying skin products off of amazon anymore. This was my last purchase and of course, no returns. Where do I send my doctor's bill?
customer_reviews.author: janie

customer_reviews.title: Shaving GEL not cream
customer_reviews.text: I searched for shaving cream intending to use it for slime for my kids. I bought this particular one because of the price, but then realized when I got it that it is shaving gel not shaving cream. It did not work for making slime.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Mo

customer_reviews.title: Great for sensitive skin people!
customer_reviews.text: I have very sensitive skin. I'm disabled in wheelchair & need something easy & good for sensitive skin. I love this shave cream. It feels like Silk & it's very easy to put on. Gives a close safe shave.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Wallace-Osburn

customer_reviews.title: Sensitive skin????
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, if this were advertised for a lumberjacks thick, strong skin, I would believe it. I never leave reviews, but I had to leave one on this shaving cream. I have dry, sensitive legs that break out in itchy red bumps/razor burn if I use a bad shaving cream or shaving lotion. When this happens, it's usually 1-2 hours after the shave. With this, it was almost immediate. This has never happened with any other product. And my legs aren't SUPER sensitive, but this product is so harsh on your skin. I will be throwing this product in the garbage where it belongs.
customer_reviews.author: jessica

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth the purchase
customer_reviews.text: A very light scent. Doesn't take alot as it whips up into a thick creamy texture. Great product
customer_reviews.author: RaeRae

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: This shaving cream was exactly what I was looking for. Worked perfect for my sensitive skin. I’ve tried many shaving creams & many with little to no fragrance & always found irritation when shaving. This shaving cream does exactly what it says it does. Gives me “Satin Care” legs. The application is so foamy & so rich a little truly goes a long way. I love the chic all white RUST FREE bottle. I will be buying this & only this shaving cream!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Works Wonders on Sensitive Skin!
customer_reviews.text: I have very touchy skin, especially when it comes to shaving. This Gillette Satin shaving cream works wonders. It doesn’t leave my skin dry and itchy after shaving, and actually leaves a cool moisturizer feeling on my skin after use. Would definitely recommend for those with sensitive skin, like me!
customer_reviews.author: Justine

customer_reviews.title: For Men Out There
customer_reviews.text: It works perfectly and it's cheaper than Gillette for men so why not? I've been shaving with these twice a week for a month with ZERO problems. Very smooth shave, no razor bumps, no irritation afterwards, and no annoying smells, and it's cheaper than "For Men" brands. What more can I say? 5/5
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Astringent scent?!
customer_reviews.text: This foams well and all, but it for being sensitive, it reminds me of that astringent with the sail boat on it. Super weird scent! Not stinging or anything, works well, astringent sort of scent.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Leonard

customer_reviews.title: Less red bumps after shaving!
customer_reviews.text: This shaving cream is my favorite. I’ve had way less red bumps after shaving my bikini area. Great product for a great price.
customer_reviews.author: HKK

customer_reviews.title: Great shaving cream
customer_reviews.text: I love this shaving cream! It is amazing, my skin loves it. It’s easy to use and helps keep my skin healthy. I shave almost every time I shower so using this has been great!
customer_reviews.author: Avid Reader

customer_reviews.title: Made for a woman.  Strong enough for a man.
customer_reviews.text: This shaving cream isn't scented, has proper lather, isn't expensive and helps produce a close shave. It's marketed to females, however I'm man enough not to care.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great use for everyone
customer_reviews.text: This is one item I always forget to grab from the store. So glad it is on the list for subscription! It foams up nicely and Great for my sensitive skin! My husband even uses it on his face!
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Great Value, way cheaper than in stores, nice for dry skin
customer_reviews.text: The two pack of these are one of the best values for sensitive skin gel on Amazon and I have some very sensitive skin prone to razor burn and drying. Seems to alleviate a lot of that and I haven't been able to find a better price anywhere else.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Super smooth shave.
customer_reviews.text: Love the smoothness of my legs with this product. Not 1 nick. A little goes a long way. Nice smell too. I placed on my subscribe and save list.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Poppins

customer_reviews.title: Always use what you know works
customer_reviews.text: Didn't seem to work that good .it would lather up okay .didn't really have a good smell and it didn't seem to moisturize I went back to using men's shaving cream
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: Great product, bad packaging
customer_reviews.text: The shave cream itself is great. The last time I ordered though one of the bottles stopped working which wasted 3/4 of one of them. It’s frustrating to pay for something and not get to use it, and of course it’s past the 30 day return policy.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Wilczek

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: This has been my go-to shave gel for years. Rich and moisturizing, prevents razor burn, and very mildly scented. The Amazon price at a little under $2 a bottle is fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Grea
customer_reviews.text: I love this. I have senstive skin and this was a nice thick moisturising foam . My skin is sooo soft . Great value will be ordering nire
customer_reviews.author: Krissy Noel

customer_reviews.title: its ok
customer_reviews.text: Very lubricating moisturizing and easy to use, but the bottle mouth design is easy to squeeze out too much at one time!
customer_reviews.author: kuan

customer_reviews.title: Good for Eczmea prone skin!
customer_reviews.text: This is the only shave cream that is sensitive enough for my legs! I get super itchy legs when the weather changes and my legs get dry and any fragranced shave creams will have me scratching for days! This one is different and works great!
customer_reviews.author: Gina Salinas

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love it it’s like gel then turns into foam and a little goes a long way I usually just shave with shampoo but I got a good clean shave with this cream
customer_reviews.author: Nat

customer_reviews.title: Gently, lovely!
customer_reviews.text: I am reordering this wonderful gel for three years already. That is fantastic. And not only for girls! Husband has so sensitive skin and loves this gel.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: It’s really drying
customer_reviews.text: My skin felt extremely dry after shaving and it sucked all of the moisture out of my skin. You'd be better off using cheap conditioner than this in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Nora

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: I have eczema and have never used anything on my legs to shave for this reason. I gave this a try and I love it. Makes my legs soft and smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Paulette Pattengill

customer_reviews.title: soap and water worked just fine for me
customer_reviews.text: Haven't ever been a big shave gel user, soap and water worked just fine for me...after using this however I'm definitely converted. Smells great and seems to offer a smoother shave than other gels I've used in the past. Plus my skin is not nearly as dried out afterwards. Cuts shaving time a lot too. I'll definitely reorder.
customer_reviews.author: NCamp

customer_reviews.title: I cut myself
customer_reviews.text: Well, I don’t know how it could be for sensitive skin, even I was very slow and gentle I managed to cut my cheek a bit. Nothing dramatic, but very unpleasant.
customer_reviews.author: Evgeny

customer_reviews.title: Great for rosacea and men’s shaving
customer_reviews.text: My husband has bad rosacea. He uses this for shaving. Guess what? Less rosacea! It actually calms it and adds moisture that helps his rosacea condition
customer_reviews.author: Dr. J.

customer_reviews.title: Not a great shaving cream
customer_reviews.text: This didn’t feel great on my skin and in fact my shaved skin hurt more after than other shaving gels and this One is supposed to be for sensitive skin!
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Best shaving gel ! Like a silky hair conditioner
customer_reviews.text: Couldn’t believe how silky creamy shaving gel is ! It is so smooth just in your hand and seemed like the consistency of my hair conditioner; love it !
customer_reviews.author: Diamond

customer_reviews.title: Not for sensitive. Need to switch another brand
customer_reviews.text: I thought this will smooth while you shave, however, it’s the same that I don’t use anything. I personally don’t like it. Maybe I need to switch to another brand
customer_reviews.author: LYC

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this product a few months ago and I’m still using the first bottle. Lathers well. A little goes a long way. Would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Liz G

customer_reviews.title: Only one I use
customer_reviews.text: I don't know what I would do if this ever get discontinued! This is the only shaving cream I use and recommend for sensitive skin!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Don’t like ir
customer_reviews.text: I don’t like the smell. It is not that moisturizing in my opinion. I don’t think I would buy it again. The smell is strange!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Nice and thick
customer_reviews.text: A little goes a long way. You won't need much to get a nice, thick layer of protection. Make sure your hand is damp (not dripping wet) for optimum results. The scent is nice and light, the foamy layer stays on but is easy to rinse out of razor. This is my new favorite.
customer_reviews.author: R F Garrett

customer_reviews.title: Super shaving product definitely recommend
customer_reviews.text: Legs are super smooth great value this 2 pack last a while because you don't need alot when your shaving the gel lathers nicely and goes far. I have a subscription for this because it works so well.
customer_reviews.author: colleen35

customer_reviews.title: Good shaving foam!
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this shaving foam! It was so easy to shave with this one, didn’t have a weird strong smell and I felt moisturized afterwards. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Felicia

customer_reviews.title: Ilgenfritz review for Amazon
customer_reviews.text: great product and would recommend it for others to use / purchase. I have ordered 3 sets so far and will be back for more.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Ilgenfritz

customer_reviews.title: oh well
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because it is for ultra sensitive skin types, however, I was allergic to it. I should have read the ingredients before buying because it has Lavender, which I am allergic to.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: Purchased for a Help Box
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product to put in a help box for someone that was getting back on their feet and getting into an apartment after being homeless. It was nice to be able to order all the niceties and necessities online to my friend in one box.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Thornton-Wiatt

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Just started using it ! Not sure about the results yet but it smell good and it is super moisturizing .
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly. Needs only a small amount to make a good lather. Easy on my skin. Nice scent.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Burning sensation, minty smell
customer_reviews.text: This is marketed for sensative skin, but I had cooling/buring sensations around areas that were shaved, and it had almost a mentholated smell. Not sure if I got a bad batch, but I do not highly reccomend.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Chevalier

customer_reviews.title: Big Fan of this
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome, dispenses as a gel and then floofs into a nice lather. No scent at all-I will definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: MeliB

customer_reviews.title: It's good shaving cream and good for sensitive skin no dye in it
customer_reviews.text: Good shaving cream. It is come out clear I love that it doesn't have any dye in it too. Great for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Creamy smooth shave
customer_reviews.text: Great for sensitive skin. After each use my legs feel soft, smooth, lathers well, and lasts long. Good value.
customer_reviews.author: Maxine

customer_reviews.title: Good value for you're money!
customer_reviews.text: Great value for you're money, & works great!! Does not have any smell/fragrance to it, but it def does what it's meant to do.
customer_reviews.author: earl's♡girl♡♡8733

customer_reviews.title: Cream will not come out
customer_reviews.text: We received two broken shaving cream bottles. the aerosol won't work and the cream won't come out. May we please have a refund? Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Satin true
customer_reviews.text: My new favorite shaving cream. It is very gentle ( just like its name Satin) .. the package is designed with high quality material because it is rust free which I am very thankful for.
customer_reviews.author: DB customer

customer_reviews.title: No Rust Ring
customer_reviews.text: Good product, good value. Best part is no rust ring where can sits on tile. Yay.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good deal, works well. Could smell nicer.
customer_reviews.text: Great deal, not such a great smell. Would rather a fruity scent. Works well, no knicks or cuts with use. Lasts a decently long time.
customer_reviews.author: MyLuv115

customer_reviews.title: Great!  Keeps moist
customer_reviews.text: Love love this, takes very little gel and foams abundantly to cover both legs!
customer_reviews.author: Vikki Williams

customer_reviews.title: Good foam no scent
customer_reviews.text: Great for sensitive skin and no annoying scents. It foams up nicely and helps achieve a smooth shave.
customer_reviews.author: Runsalot

customer_reviews.title: Price worthy
customer_reviews.text: I really liked it! It helps me to much with my sensitive skin and easier! The price is good, too.
customer_reviews.author: Alle

customer_reviews.title: Great Product! Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: Very good shaving creme. Would purchase again. The price is definitely right for 2 cans of shaving creme. My very sensitive skin has no issues with this product. I didnt see any other issues when using this product which makes it an even better buy for me and my family.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Might be a good deal, not worth the pain
customer_reviews.text: Horrible broke out in rash, not very sensitive on the skin
customer_reviews.author: deesnutz

customer_reviews.title: this product is scented
customer_reviews.text: I like this shave gel and use it on my man face twice a week. It behaves just like a shave gel. However, I buy the unscented versions of everything for my wife, whose sensitivity to perfumes is so extreme, I can't even have any residues on my own skin in order to keep her from having a reaction. Whatever this product claims about sensitivity, it still has perfume in it.
customer_reviews.author: JoBo

customer_reviews.title: smells bad
customer_reviews.text: Gel foams up well. Not too pricey but it smells like cologne pretty bad. And not the good kind.
customer_reviews.author: Ad Du

customer_reviews.title: Really Good for Sensitive Skin
customer_reviews.text: I think this works great. I actually like that it doesn't have a strong scent to it. It works great.
customer_reviews.author: B4

customer_reviews.title: Great for very sensitive skin!
customer_reviews.text: Hardly any cut's and skin is so soft after, plus there is barely a scent and no itchiness! This is a winner!!
customer_reviews.author: Moore Family

customer_reviews.title: the best if you are overly sensitive.
customer_reviews.text: there is no dye , almost no fragrance, and absolutely free of many common irritants. it has the same gel formula as the regular mens Gillette sensitive minus the dye and scent. the gel is just transparent and almost immedietly expands and foams up on the skin. a little goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: Ashwin

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I usually prefer moisturizing shave creams instead of gel but these are cheap and you get a good amount.
customer_reviews.author: Pretty Kitty

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: This has been a favorite of mine forever. My legs are a bit sensitive and this is always a must have. Also for the price? No brainer
customer_reviews.author: Alexa

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shave cream.... @ a great price
customer_reviews.text: Great product. My boyfriend even loves it. He has such sensitive skin but this makes his face so soft & moisturized. Will definitely keep buying this in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Tigermom15

customer_reviews.title: Perfect and sensitive!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Always a wonderful product and this vale was on point!!! Will purchase again! I never have a problem with razor burns or irritation from the Sensitive product
customer_reviews.author: bossynow

product_meta.title: Satin Care Ultra Sensitive Shave Gel twin pack, 14oz
product_meta.description: Satin Care Ultra Sensitive is a shaving gel for women designed for sensitive skin needing special care. This shaving cream for women is free of two potential sources of irritation: dyes and fragrances, while improving razor glide to protect your skin while shaving (vs. Ivory soap) and leaving you soft and ultra smooth every time you shave. The shave gel lathers to provide incredible razor glide to help protect the skin from nicks and cuts. This shaving gel is made without elements that can irritate skin, like dyes and fragrances. Dermatologist tested for sensitive skin. Now available in a Rust-Free Can, so you don’t have to worry about rust rings in your shower. Satin Care Ultra Sensitive shave gel for women delivers satiny-smooth skin whenever and wherever you choose to shave. Shave with your favorite Venus razor for beautiful legs that look and feel like satin. Directions: Gently rub shave gel over wet skin to produce a rich lather for a smooth shave.
feature_bullets: DYE AND FRANGRANCE FREE: this shaving gel for women is specially designed for sensitive skin, made without elements that can irritate skin, like dyes and fragrances
ULTRASOFT SKIN: this shaving gel for women delivers satiny-smooth skin whenever and wherever you choose to shave
RUST-FREE CAN: No longer worry about rust rings in your shower
HELPS PROTECT: lathers to provide incredible razor glide to help protect the skin from nicks and cuts

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
